title: Honestly,Do the people around world really look at Lihkg?

replies.msg:
I am glad that Lihkg created such a great channel for us.

But,do many people really know this channel?

Should we do more promotion for Lihkg?
Twitter,Reddit,Facebook,whatever.Use them to promote.

We do it, and people will see it
Not people want to see it, then we do it

Try and see how far we can go
I think we should do a bit more promotion about this channel. Probably mention it on Twitter/reddit next time there’s news.

quote.msg: I think we should do a bit more promotion about this channel. Probably mention it on Twitter/reddit next time there’s news.

replies.msg:
Yeah
Although it is not our main goal,we can still use Twitter and reddit to promote Lihkg and “world” channels

It’s pretty simple.Only simple English is fine.

You may have one or two I believe
And if they are so passionate in our revolution, they will not be reading posts “especially translated“ for them, but using the tools to read our cantonese posts
So I said please go to reddit or twiiter if you really wanna communicate with them

I am not sure if our voice can reach the other end of the world.

But I don't think we should give up doing this.

I was shocked by tonight's news that a 15-year-old girl was brutally murdered and was possibly raped.

#savehkppl

Hello from Pennsylvania, USA

I am a HK supporter. I have been following the news since 721. I found LIHKG from reddit. Thank you for making the English (world) section I don’t speak Cantonese but I’ve been learning how.

Also, I go to school by bus.

Oh, one more thing.

You HK people should know that your voice is absolutely being heard around the world. The public in America is starting to pay attention especially after the NBA and Blizzard events. On 10.13 there will be a rally in NYC to support the 5 demands and oppose the mask ban.
